column4: i hope someone can help, i need to change file type associations in bulk. i don't want to do right-click/properties/etc for every type (there are a lot).... is there a file or better yet a GUI for editing these?
if you don't have that file, then use the right click method once to see how it works
I have a mimeapps.list which has a few entries, but not most of them
hmm.  You'll have to experiment, I'm not sure
not offhand, no.  You could write something using inotify I guess
